沶字的基本解释

沶
yí
古河名，在今中国湖北省。

沶
chí
　ㄔˊ
古同“坻”，水中的小块陆地。

沶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］
［《廣韻》與之切，平之，以。］
水名。参见“沶水”。
[②]［chí］
［《集韻》陳尼切，平脂，澄。］
同“坻1”。
水中的小块陆地。

沶字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　沶； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页613第12
【唐韻】與之切【集韻】盈之切，?音飴。水名。　又【集韻】陳尼切，音墀。同坻。【前漢·諸侯王表】沶陵康侯魏駟。　又神至切，音示。沶鄕，縣名。見【左傳·桓十三年註】。　又直利切，音緻。義同。

沶字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
沶字的起名意思

同“坻”，指水中的小块陆地，也是古河名。

Basic explanation of words
Rush
yí
The name of Furukawa is in Hubei Province, China.
Rush
chí
ㄔ
Ancient Tong "di", a small piece of land in the water.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］
["Guangyun" cut with it, flat it, with. ]
Water name. See "Jianshui".
[②]［chí］
["Ji Yun" Chen Niche, Pingzhi, Cheng. ]
Same as "坻1".
A small piece of land in the water.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　沶; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 613-12
[Tang Yun] Cut with it [Jiyun] Cut with surplus,? Sound. Water name.　[Jiyun] Chen Niche, sound chi. The same di. 【Former Han Dynasty·Princes and Kings Form】Wei Si of Kang Hou, Fuling.　It's so amazing, the sound shows. Huanyun, the county name. See [Zuo Zhuan·Huan Thirteen Years Note].　It's straight and sharp, the tone is sharp. The same meaning.

Rush
Name meaning
Same as "坻", it refers to a small piece of land in the water, which is also the name of the ancient river.
yí, chí, shì
